paragraph: Tim Barry is an American singer, songwriter, and guitarist.  He is the lead singer of the Richmond, Virginia-based punk rock band Avail.  In addition to performing with Avail, he was the bass guitarist in the Richmond-based folk punk band (Young) Pioneers from 1994 to 1995. Barry has been performing folk music on his own since 2004.
Laurel Street Demo & Live at Munford Elementary – 2013 – Chunksaah Records
Raising Hell & Living Cheap, Live in Richmond – 2014 Chunksaah Records
The Roads to Richmond - 2019– Chunksaah Records
Frank Turner / Tim Barry – Split EP (October 13, 2009)
Live (featuring Tim Barry and La Par Force) – 2006
